text.title: Amherst College Course Requirements
text.more: This is an incomplete visualization of which classes are required by which other classes at Amherst College.  I haven't yet included which classes are core requirements of each major, nor links to the most recent version of each class, nor which classes are substitutable.  I believe 99% of prereqs are included in the edges.
text.intro: Which classes lead to which at Amherst College . It's worth verifying the information here on the course scheduler

legend.edgeLabel: class A is required by Class B
